Method Detail

escapePath

public java.lang.String escapePath(java.lang.String path)
Escapes relative path to a full path ex. /tmp/example/./test/test1/.. -> /tmp/example/test

Parameters:
unescaped - path
Returns:
the path escaped

escapePath

public java.lang.String escapePath(java.lang.String path,
                                   java.lang.String currentPath,
                                   java.lang.String user)
Escapes relative and abstract path to a full path ex. ~/example/test -> /user/example/test ex. /user$ example/test/../test1/. -> /user/example/test1

Parameters:
path - unescaped path
currentPath - the path that are currently located in
user - the user in realltiv to the path
Returns:
the path escaped

createUniqName

public java.lang.String createUniqName()
Creates a uniq logical name ex. 12-43-12-76-43-85-23-85-34-72-12448971241

Returns:
a uniq name

translateFileNameToFullPath

public java.lang.String translateFileNameToFullPath(java.lang.String fileName)
Returns the full path to a MDFS file form its abstract file name

Parameters:
fileName - the MDFS file name, ex. 12-34-15-63-23-55-55-34-3423513561
Returns:
full path to the file on the local file system

translateFileNameToDirPath

public java.lang.String translateFileNameToDirPath(java.lang.String fileName)
Returns the full path to the parent dir of a MDFS file on the local filesystem

Parameters:
fileName - the MDFS file name
Returns:
full path to the parent dir of the MDFS file on the local filesystem
